history.proof: intros H1. apply incl_cons_linv in H1. destruct H1 as [H11 H12]. sfirstorder use: in_inv, incl_right_cons_choose.

exceptions.exn: In environment X : Type x : X l : list X y : X m : list X H11 : In x (y :: m) H121 : In y l Unable to unify "In x (y :: m)" with "y = x".
[Focus] Wrong bullet +: Current bullet + is not finished.

In environment X : Type x : X l : list X y : X m : list X H11 : In x (y :: m) H121 : In y l Unable to unify "forall a : ?M1434, In a ?M1436 -> In a (?M1435 :: ?M1437)" with "(fix In (a : X) l {struct l} : Prop := match l with | nil => False | b :: m => b = a \\/ In a m end) y l".
In environment X : Type x : X l : list X y : X m : list X H11 : In x (y :: m) H121 : In y l Unable to unify "In x (y :: m)" with "In y l".
[Focus] Wrong bullet -: Current bullet + is not finished.

original: intros H1. apply incl_cons_linv in H1. destruct H1 as [H11 H12]. apply incl_right_cons_choose in H12. destruct H12 as [H121 | H122]. - left. split. + apply H11. + apply incl_tl. apply H11. - right. apply incl_cons_rinv in H121. destruct H121 as [m1 [m2 [H1211 [H1212 H1213]]]]. destruct H1212 as [H12121 H12122]. destruct H1213 as [H12131 H12132]. destruct H12121 as [H121211 H121212]. destruct H12131 as [H121311 H121312]. split. + apply H121311. + right. split. * apply H121211. * apply H121312.
